org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss.impl
Class BaseHttpgServiceConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss.impl.BaseGssConnection
      org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss.impl.BaseHttpgServiceConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
GssConnection, HttpgServiceConnection
public abstract class BaseHttpgServiceConnection
extends BaseGssConnection
implements HttpgServiceConnection

Provides a base implementation for a connection to an httpg service resource.
